summary: BOUGHT THIS VEHICLE USED.  EACH OF THE TWO TIMES WE HAVE FILLED UP THE TANK WITH GAS THE TANK HAS OVERFLOWED SPILLING AN ESTIMATED PINT OF GAS OUT OF THE TANK AND DOWN THE EXTERIOR OF THE VEHICLE AND ONTO THE GROUND.  EACH TIME GAS HAS SPILLED ONTO THE DRIVER AS WELL.  RESEARCHING THIS ISSUE IT APPEARS THAT REPLACING THE GAS TANK RESOLVES THIS ISSUE.  I FEEL THIS IS A DANGEROUS SAFETY ISSUE THAT SHOULD BE ADDRESSED WITH A RECALL.  REF. SERVICE BULLETIN NO.: SB-14-003-13, NHTSA ID NUMBER: 10052148.  *TR
